wikipedia_page.main: Bombardier Henry Herbert Reed GC (1911 – 20 June 1941), of No. 2 Battalion, 1 Maritime Anti-Aircraft Regiment, Royal Artillery, was posthumously awarded the George Cross for the "gallant and utterly selfless action" he showed after the merchant ship SS Cormount was attacked by German E-boats and planes on 20 June 1941.

response: * Herbert Reed (British Army soldier) (Henry Herbert Reed, died 1940), British sailor, George Cross recipient
* Herbert Reed (British Army soldier) (1911–1940), British recipient of the George Cross
